The WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission can be granted from the browser on your PC! You don\'t have to install any drivers or programs
1) Go to \"Android-Settings\"\n2) Click \"About phone\"\n3) Click \"Build Number\" multiple times until the \"Developer options\" are active

1) Go to "Android-Settings"
2) Click "System"
3) Click "Advanced"
4) Click "Developer Options"
4) Enable "USB debugging"

1) Open "www.webadb.com" on your PC
2) Connect your phone with your PC
3) On your PC click "Start"
4) Click "Add device"
3) Click *YOUR DEVICE*
4) Click "Connect" on the pop up
5) Click "Connect" next to the "Add device" button
6) On your phone click "Allow"
1) On your PC click \"Interactive shell\" in the left panel\n2) In the terminal window type the command below and hit the enter button
